description:
It is three weeks since Naruto began training under Jiraiya. And Naruto has been on the brink of collapse many times.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Probe: Du bist völlig auf dich allein gestellt!
Live or Die: Risk It All to Win It All!
Questione di vita o di morte
Sei ka Shi ka!? Menkyo Kaiden wa Inochigake!
Une question de vie ou de mort
ถ่ายทอดวิชาเสี่ยงด้วยชีวิต
生か死か!? 免許皆伝は命懸け!
